Natalist Magnesium Plus 300 mg Drink Mix with Calcium & Vitamin D3 - Complete Whole Body Replenish & Relax Supplements for Women - Vegetarian, Gluten-Free Raspberry Flavor Powder - 15 Servings Amazon's Choice highlights highly rated, well-priced products available to ship immediately.Amazon's Choice in Calcium Mineral Supplements by NATALIST We don't know when or if this item will be back in stock. - PREGNANCY-SAFE RELAXATION SUPPORT - Deliciously formulated blend of magnesium, calcium, and vitamin D3 to support relaxation, calcium absorption, and bone health.* - SUPPORTS HEALTHY MAGNESIUM LEVELS - There is a high prevalence of magnesium deficiency in pregnant women; adding a magnesium supplement to your daily regimen may help restore healthy levels.* - PROTECTING MOTHER EARTH - All Natalist products and packaging are 100% plastic neutral; for every pound of plastic we sell, we facilitate the removal of a pound of plastic pollution—giving your purchase a net-zero plastic footprint. - MADE BY MOMS FOR YOU - Formulated to be safe to use during pregnancy and while breastfeeding; with just the right amount of raspberry, our calm blend is tasty and refreshing. - ABOUT THE BRAND - A team of moms and doctors that offers fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum essentials that are science-backed and designed with sustainability in mind. We take the guess workout of reproductive health with thoughtfully designed products to support you on every step of your fertility and reproductive journey. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Additional Details Small Business Shop products from small business brands sold in Amazon's store. Discover more about the small businesses partnering with Amazon and Amazon's commitment to empowering them. Note: Products with electrical plugs are designed for use in the US. Top reviews from the United States There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later. Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023 My doctor suggested I add magnesium to my prenatal vitamin regiment because of knee pain at night. The calcium is a bonus. It tastes pretty good, it is a little grainy if the water isn't hot enough when you mix it. I'm on the subscription (it is a smaller amount but is worth the money) I plan to drink it the remainder of my pregnancy. It helps with the pain but it doesn't take it away completely. It seems to work better when I drink it consistently. Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023 Love this for my pregnancy and easy to digest! Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023 I'm not sure how well it worked, I think it made sleep easier and better... but it sure was tasty. I'm disappointed it's gone. Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023 Good tasting relaxing evening drink since it's made with warm water. Has been real lying helping me get some more sleep. It doesn't completely dissolve so a little bit of a grainy finish. Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022 The flavor is nice and the effects are calming. However it is chalky and the powder does not completely dissolve even when stirred repeatedly. The leftover powder texture was not great for pregnancy nauseau. Not sure I'd repurchase due to these issues. It was almost there! Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2022 The flavors not there at all pretty much. Hard to take down if your prego n nauseated at all. Works but idk if I can stomach it. Also thought it was strange it didn't come with a scoop. Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023 I find the mix to be kind of bland, no matter how much or little I use. It's not bad, but I'm also not sure it's actually helping or not. Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022 The powdered doesn't absorb into the water so you have to keep shaking/stirring it before every drink. It's also pretty flavorless and chalky.
